channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:25 Air alarm to Ternopil Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 23:25 Air alarm to Ternopil Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Ternopil_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
